HeroText.title: Hi I'm Dark
HeroText.pitch: I enjoy turning ideas into digital products that make a difference. By combining technology and design, I create web experiences that inspire trust and generate impact.

About.title: About Me
About.grid1_sub: Over the last 3 years, I have sharpened my frontend and backend skills to deliver dynamic and reliable web applications.
About.grid3_sub: Flexible to collaborate remotely with teams worldwide.
About.grid4_cta: Do you want to start a project together?
About.grid5_sub: I specialize in multiple languages, frameworks, and tools that let me build scalable and robust applications.

ecommerce-platform.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce-platform.description: I built a high-performance e-commerce platform focused on speed, scalability, and a smooth user experience.
subDescription: I built the backend using Laravel 11 with Laravel Octane to optimize concurrency and server performance.
I implemented the frontend in Next.js 15, achieving a modern, fast, and responsive interface.
I deployed the whole system in Docker containers with Nginx as the web server, ensuring portability and scalability.
I integrated payments through the Mercado Pago Checkout API, guaranteeing secure and reliable transactions.

social-network.title: Social Network with Real-Time Chat
social-network.description: I developed an interactive social network with full features and real-time communication between users.
subDescription: I implemented a post system with likes, comments, saves, and user following.
I designed communities where users can share content and join conversations.
I integrated the GetStream API to provide real-time chat with private messaging and group creation.
I enabled sending multimedia content in chats to enhance the communication experience.

appointments-system.title: Medical Appointment Booking System
appointments-system.description: I developed a comprehensive system for managing and booking medical appointments, streamlining patient care and admin processes.
subDescription: Allows patients to quickly and securely book online or in-person medical appointments.
Helps medical and admin staff efficiently manage schedules, patients, and availability.
I implemented an AI-based recommendation system that suggests doctors based on the patient's issue.
I improved the user experience with an intuitive interface and automated flows that reduce waiting times.

emotion-recognition-system.title: Emotion Recognition System with Computer Vision
emotion-recognition-system.description: I developed a computer-vision-based system to recognize emotions in children with special needs, supporting emotional learning and regulation.
subDescription: I used computer-vision and machine-learning algorithms to detect and recognize facial expressions in real time.
I provided interactive visual feedback to help children identify and understand their emotions.
I optimized the system to work accurately even in environments with varying lighting conditions.
I contributed to inclusive technology tools focused on assisted emotional learning.

cyberpunk-hacker-game.title: Cyberpunk Hacker Game – Gemini
cyberpunk-hacker-game.description: I built an interactive AI-driven game that generates stories, scenes, and choices in a cyberpunk apocalyptic world.
subDescription: I implemented the frontend using modern technologies to offer an immersive and intuitive experience.
I integrated Gemini to dynamically generate the story, dialogues, and images based on the player's decisions.
The game starts automatically with a zombie apocalypse scene and evolves based on user actions.
Each decision affects the narrative, events, and the chances of survival within the generated world.

software-agency-website.title: Professional Website for a Software Agency
software-agency-website.description: I designed and developed a corporate WordPress site optimized for performance, SEO, and user experience.
subDescription: I built a fully manageable WordPress site tailored to the needs of a software agency.
I optimized performance and PageSpeed metrics, achieving outstanding scores in speed and usability.
I implemented solid technical and structural SEO practices to improve search visibility.
I applied a professional, modern, and responsive design to ensure a great experience on any device.

tsoluciona.title: Web Developer
contents: I developed and implemented a comprehensive web-based inventory and baggage management system to optimize stock control and documentation between branches and suppliers.
I automated key processes such as inventory tracking and document management, significantly reducing human error and response times.
I achieved a 50% improvement in operational efficiency by digitizing critical processes.
I designed the system architecture with scalability in mind, allowing it to adapt to the company's future needs.

interiberica.title: Web Developer
contents: I developed and optimized existing web systems, incorporating new functionalities and improving overall performance.
I worked with eCommerce platforms such as OpenCart and PrestaShop, developing and integrating custom plugins.
I developed WordPress projects for corporate websites and online stores, ensuring scalability and maintainability.
I implemented and consumed proprietary and third-party REST APIs, including integrations with OpenAI and other external services to extend functionality and automate processes.
I designed and implemented responsive interfaces adapted to different devices, increasing user satisfaction and reducing loading times by 40%.

freelance.title: Full Stack Freelance Developer
contents: I develop full-stack web applications, working on both the frontend and backend with modern technologies such as React, Next.js, Laravel, and Node.js.
I have built a personal portfolio and scalable projects that integrate external APIs and SQL/NoSQL databases, strengthening my skills in high-performance solutions.
